Fund and Flip

Get funding and flipping tips from local experts!

Ric Beaudoin, local residential and commercial broker, will discuss the current lending culture of the banks. He has over 30 years of experience in the mortgage lending industry. During his career, he Ric has helped thousands of people and businesses purchase their dream home or business. He is current with Omega Mortgage,providing mortgage lending services

 

 

Chris Roche, local real estate investor, will present a recent residential rehab and slip in Roxbury, MA. Chris has been involved in real estate since 2000. He is a private lender, short sale negotiator and real estate investor.

 

 

 

Monthly Meeting

6:30 pm, Thursday, December 15, 2011

Doubletree Guestsuites, 400 Soldier's Field Road, Boston

free for members; $25 for non-members

free parking
